plot outline: Bow Bow is the tale of a little boy whose world revolves around his pet dog. He is a little upset about its lethargic nature and tries different training methods to make it an enthusiastic pet. Unexpectedly, he loses the dog when it tries to save two people in a crucial situation. The boy becomes depressed. The rest of the movie shows whether he got back his dog or not.
title: Bow Bow
plot: _Bow Bow_ (qv) is the tale of a little boy whose world revolves around his pet dog. He is a little upset about its lethargic nature and tries different training methods to make it an enthusiastic pet. Unexpectedly, he loses the dog when it tries to save two people in a crucial situation. The boy becomes depressed. The rest of the movie shows whether he got back his dog or not.
